cordance with all applicable requirements for work. I further certify that the supplies are of the quality and quantity specifed
and are in all respects in conformance with the requirements of ASME V-10, ASTM E797-05, ASTM E114-95 (R2005) and
ASTM E317. The unit was calibrated and certified in according to the manufacturer calibration and test procedure. The blocks
used are traceable to the NIST requirement. (Ref .: INF.PG.3456-25)

of the manufacturer.
